definition: Matsushima (name)/Matsushima town and national park in Miyagi prefecture, Japan

sentences.english: Pine Island glacier (PIG) is one of many at the fringes of the West Antarctic ice sheet.
sentences.chinese: 松島冰川是位於南極西陲冰原上衆多冰川中的一個。

sentences.english: The Pine Island Glacier flows out of Antarctica's Hudson Mountains and floats over the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 松島冰川從南極的哈德遜山脈流出浮在海面上。

sentences.english: The Pine Island Glacier flows out of Antarctica’s Hudson Mountains and floats over the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 松島冰川從南極的哈德遜山脈流出浮在海面上。

sentences.english: In the case of the Pine IslandGlacier it may already be occurring.
sentences.chinese: 在松島冰川，這種情況可能已經發生了。
